messages.subject: Re: Unschooling Bumper Stickers
messages.messageBody:
<< We're using <A HREF="http://www.cafeshops.com/bhha">
http://www.cafeshops.com/bhha</A> to design our stuff (more products

available soon, as our *leader* is finishing her finals this week!) ~ may be

a good idea to check out for actually printing up some cool unschooling

paraphernalia, though I think the prices are a bit high ($12 coffee mug!).

Then again, it's a worthwhile investment to give gifts to those, er,

uncooperative/unsupportive family members for Christmas! >>

Our son is doing this too. He came up with - Life is cool when we unschool
<A HREF="http://">www.cafeshops.com/unschooldesigns</A>
Kim

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschooling Bumper Stickers
messages.msgSnippet: We re using http://www.cafeshops.com/bhha to design our stuff (more products available soon, as our *leader* is
messages.messageBody:
We're using <A HREF="http://www.cafeshops.com/bhha">http://www.cafeshops.com/bhha</A> to design our stuff (more products
available soon, as our *leader* is finishing her finals this week!) ~ may be
a good idea to check out for actually printing up some cool unschooling
paraphernalia, though I think the prices are a bit high ($12 coffee mug!).
Then again, it's a worthwhile investment to give gifts to those, er,
uncooperative/unsupportive family members for Christmas!

In a message dated 5-6-2003 3:36:44 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
amycats2@... writes:

> >
> >Our hs assn slogan is: You can count the seeds in an apple, but can you
> >count
> >the apples in a seed?
> >
>
> I really like the image that brings to mind and would really like one of
> those for my car. Does it have the name of your ass'n on it? LMK how I
> might
> get one!!
>
>


diana,
The wackiest widow westriver...
“I'm just a human being trying to make it in a world that is very rapidly
losing it's understanding of being human" John Trudell

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschooling Bumper Stickers
messages.msgSnippet: Our hs assn slogan is: You can count the seeds in an apple, but can you count the apples in a seed? Right next to the *snotty* (though thoroughly enjoyable)
messages.messageBody:
Our hs assn slogan is: You can count the seeds in an apple, but can you count
the apples in a seed?

Right next to the *snotty* (though thoroughly enjoyable) bumper stickers,
would be my favorite: May God grant you twice what you wish for me
(I've seen people withdraw the *bird* after being cut off ~ I know this
sticker works!!)

diana,
The wackiest widow westriver...
“I'm just a human being trying to make it in a world that is very rapidly
losing it's understanding of being human" John Trudell
